Introduction to qGSEA

Zhuoer Dong

2019-10-17

Source: vignettes/qGSEA.Rmd
qGSEA.Rmd
library(qGSEA)

quick start

  1. Shiny App 1 
shiny::runApp(system.file('shiny/app.R', package = 'qGSEA'))
  1. command line

refer to examples of make_gsea_input()

  1. GSEA 下载

进入 GSEA官方下载页面 2 ，在 Software tab下载“javaGSEA Java Jar file”， 在 MSigDB tab 下载想要分析的 gene set collections (.gmt文件)，最常用的是 h.all.v6.1.symbols.gmt

package structure

http://software.broadinstitute.org/cancer/software/gsea/wiki/index.php/Data_formats

  1. expression data .txt file

raw data -> matrix: rGEO::read_gse_matrix() matrix -> .txt: write_txt() matrix <- .txt: read_txt()

  1. you have run the app on your local computer since it needs to read/write local files↩︎

  2. 需要输入邮箱登入方可进入↩︎
